v8:item.v8:content: Offsets the left margin for printing checks, in millimiters (for example, -5 or +10)
Offsets the top margin for printing checks, in millimiters (for example, -5 or +10)
The image proportion should be 167x100 pixels
If you would like your logo in our emailed invoices. Place the URL to your logo image.
